text: I muli hua di daa gi daha di tama i di uu, gei Hannah gaa lahi a mee gi Shiloh mo dana kau daane dela guu dolu ono ngadau, mo nia pauna palaawaa e motolu, mo dana budehede gili manu guu honu waini no lodo. Ma e aha maa di tama la di tama hua dulii loo, gei mee gu lahi hua a mee gi di Hale o Dimaadua dela i Shiloh.
